name: Subaru Shibutani
description: {{nihongo|'''Subaru Shibutani'''|渋谷 すばる|Shibutani Subaru|born September 22, 1981}} is a Japanese singer, actor, and lyricist. He was among [[Johnny's Jr.]] fans as a Kansai Jr. member during his early career. After he began his solo career, he became the main vocalist of the Japanese male idol group [[Kanjani Eight]], which originally debuted as an [[enka]] group. He left the group in 2018. His first solo album ''Nisai'' was released in October 2019.
